name: TimeZoneArena
description:
Each player born with same timer, zero time left means death, but players can search for the time resources distributed in the map to add time or kill others to loot their time resources, this means a lot.

The map was separated to 8 parts and each team will born in different area randomly. Players’ time will stay put if they are inside a special moving area locating close to the map center. In this area the one who owns most resources will be marked by system and seen by others. The marked player’s team will win victory directly if he could survive for 3 minutes and keep his resources always the most one during that time period. So the tactical strategy of time point and location to enter the moving area are very important. As the circle keeps moving, there’s no persistent blindage to offensive and defensive sides.
